reviewText:
This was an awesome movie!  I first saw it at the Cape Fear Independent Film Festival.  It is a great look at people who make movies in their spare time while being in the entertainment industry.  It's also a relationship piece, but above all of that it's funny!

This South African film is totally relate-able to American audiences.  It's definitely worth a look.

I'm going to keep an eye out for more from the writer/director Quinton Lavery!

Watch this film!!
